caption.p: Structure and genome of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). (A) There are four structural proteins as follows: spike (S) surface glycoprotein (purple); membrane (M) protein (orange); nucleocapsid (N) protein (blue); and envelope (E) protein (green). Genomic RNA is shown encased in the N protein. (B) The SARS-CoV-2 genome is arranged in the order of 5′-replicase (ORF1a/b)–structural proteins [spike (S)–envelope (E)–membrane (M)–nucleocapsid (N)]−3′.
